idea: We are professional photography firm based in Mumbai. We specialize in documentary style photography, industrial, corporate and panoramic photography. For more details visit www.asheshshah.photography

idea: Sequretek is a cyber security product and solutions company that has is primarily focused on the enterprise market segment. name: Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited

idea: EGK FOODS is a 18 month old Startup India registered enterprise that is looking yo make a positive impact on the onion trade. Currently there is a 25% wastage of the annual yield (5 Million Metric Tonnes) and this is the number that EGK Foods wants to impact in a big way.
name: EGK FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We seek to create a dominant footprint in the untapped Wealth Management space in India.Our offering is an online platform for investors to be able to transact as well as monitor their investments in mutual funds, insurance and other investment/Wealth management products.

idea: Origgon is a social search engine, http://origgon.com focusing on a unique niche on the search engine market of the future

idea: MilesAhead with its Brand named JENEXT is the first ever multimodal,  multilingual , talent reach platform to Cross pollinate the Job seekers especially the Blue collar workers and Freshers to suitable Employers especially the SME segments through a unique last mile approach.
